mapper.select: select artwork_id, artwork_name, release_count, release_username, artwork_origin, artwork_img_address, artwork_level, artwork_release_date, artwork_collect_code, examine_admin_id, examine_date, examine_state from artwork_examine where artwork_id = #{artworkId}
mapper.insert: insert into artwork_examine(artwork_name, release_count, release_username, artwork_origin, artwork_img_address, artwork_level, artwork_release_date, artwork_collect_code, examine_admin_id, examine_date, examine_state) values (#{artworkName}, #{releaseCount}, #{releaseUsername}, #{artworkOrigin}, #{artworkImgAddress}, #{artworkLevel}, #{artworkReleaseDate}, #{artworkCollectCode}, #{examineAdminId}, #{examineDate}, #{examineState})

insert into artwork_examine(artwork_name, release_count, release_username, artwork_origin, artwork_img_address, artwork_level, artwork_release_date, artwork_collect_code, examine_admin_id, examine_date, examine_state) values
(#{entity.artworkName}, #{entity.releaseCount}, #{entity.releaseUsername}, #{entity.artworkOrigin}, #{entity.artworkImgAddress}, #{entity.artworkLevel}, #{entity.artworkReleaseDate}, #{entity.artworkCollectCode}, #{entity.examineAdminId}, #{entity.examineDate}, #{entity.examineState})

insert into artwork_examine(artwork_name, release_count, release_username, artwork_origin, artwork_img_address, artwork_level, artwork_release_date, artwork_collect_code, examine_admin_id, examine_date, examine_state) values

on duplicate key update artwork_name = values(artwork_name), release_count = values(release_count), release_username = values(release_username), artwork_origin = values(artwork_origin), artwork_img_address = values(artwork_img_address), artwork_level = values(artwork_level), artwork_release_date = values(artwork_release_date), artwork_collect_code = values(artwork_collect_code), examine_admin_id = values(examine_admin_id), examine_date = values(examine_date), examine_state = values(examine_state)
mapper.update:
update artwork_examine
artwork_name = #{artworkName},
release_count = #{releaseCount},
release_username = #{releaseUsername},
artwork_origin = #{artworkOrigin},

where artwork_id = #{artworkId}
